summary: Provides core management of a document collection within a search index, handling operations such as adding new entries, updating existing ones, deleting items, clearing the entire set, and retrieving all stored entity identifiers. Designed as a base class where concrete implementations supply the specifics for update and removal logic.
business_intent: Support the maintenance of indexed data for a particular entity type, enabling higherâ€‘level search components to keep the index synchronized with the underlying data without performing search queries.
